A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The only reason this was not the WORST Start Wars movie was because Luke was in it. The way they portrayed Luke was horrible. Luke is not a bumbling idiot who is moderately good at Jedi fighting he is eager\, witty and fights the darkness. BREAKING NEWS: Disney has officially ruined Star Wars. Disney made serious moments silly. There was no Jedi vs Jedi fighting. This was a complete disgrace to the Star Wars legacy. George Lucas\, please save us\, you are our only hope. God speed and may the Force be with you.
